languages.text: "Да". {n}Едкая издевка исчезает на миг из голоса Немезита.{/n} "Став камнем на этой дороге, я стану опорой для ног тех, кто пройдет по мне в будущее".
"Yes." {n}The caustic mockery vanishes from Nemesite's voice for a brief moment.{/n} "And by becoming a pebble, I will support the feet of all those who walk this road into the future."
languages.original_text: "Да". {n}Едкая издевка исчезает на миг из голоса Немезита.{/n} "Став камнем на этой дороге, я стану опорой для ног тех, кто пройдет по мне в будущее".

traits.locale_text: "It is so." {n}The caustic mockery vanishes from Nemesite's voice for a brief moment.{/n} "And by becoming a rock, I will support the feet of those who walk this road into the future."
"It is so." {n}The caustic mockery vanishes from Nemesite's voice for a brief moment.{/n} "And by becoming a rock, I will support the feet of those who walk this road into the future."
"So it is." {n}The caustic mockery vanishes from Nemesite's voice for a brief moment.{/n} "And by becoming a pebble, I will support the feet of all those who walk this road into the future."
"So it is." {n}The caustic mockery vanishes from Nemesite's voice for a brief moment.{/n} "And by becoming a pebble, I will support the feet of all those who walk this road into the future."
"Yes." {n}The caustic mockery vanishes from Nemesite's voice for a brief moment.{/n} "And by becoming a pebble, I will support the feet of all those who walk this road into the future."
"Yes." {n}The caustic mockery vanishes from Nemesite's voice for a brief moment.{/n} "And by becoming a pebble, I will support the feet of all those who walk this road into the future."

languages.text: "Ja." {n}Der ätzende Spott verschwindet für einen Moment aus Nemesits Stimme.{/n} "Und indem ich zum Kiesel werde, stütze ich die Füße aller, die diese Straße in die Zukunft benutzen."
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}The caustic mockery vanishes from Nemesite's voice for a brief moment.{/n} "And by becoming a pebble, I will support the feet of all those who walk this road into the future."

traits.locale_text: "Ja." {n}Der ätzende Spott verschwindet für einen Moment aus Nemesits Stimme.{/n} "Und indem ich zum Kiesel werde, stütze ich die Füße aller, die diese Straße in die Zukunft benutzen."

languages.text: «Sí». {n}La burla mordaz desaparece de la voz de Nemesitio durante un instante.{/n} «Y al convertirme en piedra, seré un apoyo para todos los que recorran este camino en el futuro».
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}The caustic mockery vanishes from Nemesite's voice for a brief moment.{/n} "And by becoming a pebble, I will support the feet of all those who walk this road into the future."

traits.locale_text: «Sí». {n}La burla mordaz desaparece de la voz de Nemesitio durante un instante.{/n} «Y al convertirme en piedra, seré un apoyo para todos los que recorran este camino en el futuro».

languages.text: 「あぁ」{n}ネメサイトの声からピリッとした嘲笑が一瞬消える。{/n}「そして石ころになることで、この道を歩むすべての人間の足元を支え、未来につなげるのさ」
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}The caustic mockery vanishes from Nemesite's voice for a brief moment.{/n} "And by becoming a pebble, I will support the feet of all those who walk this road into the future."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ」{n}ネメサイトの声からピリッとした嘲笑が一瞬消える。{/n}「そして石ころになることで、この道を歩むすべての人間の足元を支え、未来につなげるのさ」

languages.text: “没错。”{n}涅墨斯特声音中刻薄的嘲弄声消失了片刻。{/n}“我愿成为石头。我将会支撑所有走在这条道路上的人们，让他们走向未来。”
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}The caustic mockery vanishes from Nemesite's voice for a brief moment.{/n} "And by becoming a pebble, I will support the feet of all those who walk this road into the future."

traits.locale_text: “没错。”{n}涅墨斯特声音中刻薄的嘲弄声消失了片刻。{/n}“我愿成为石头。我将会支撑所有走在这条道路上的人们，让他们走向未来。”

languages.text: « Oui, » {n}répond Némésite, dont la voix perd brièvement toute trace de moquerie.{/n} « Et en devenant ce caillou, j'affecte tous ceux qui emprunteront cette route à l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}The caustic mockery vanishes from Nemesite's voice for a brief moment.{/n} "And by becoming a pebble, I will support the feet of all those who walk this road into the future."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, » {n}répond Némésite, dont la voix perd brièvement toute trace de moquerie.{/n} « Et en devenant ce caillou, j'affecte tous ceux qui emprunteront cette route à l'avenir. »

languages.text: "Evet." {n}Nemezit'in sesindeki alaycı sert ton, kısa bir süreliğine yok oluyor.{/n} "Eşi benzeri bulunmaz birine dönüşerek de gelecekte bu yola baş koyacakları destekleyebileceğim."
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}The caustic mockery vanishes from Nemesite's voice for a brief moment.{/n} "And by becoming a pebble, I will support the feet of all those who walk this road into the future."
